data:
Dr. Kenichi Nishikawa Office: 039 V. M. Chambers Bld. Phone: (256) 372-5062 E-Mail: kenichi.nishikawa@aamu.edu Education 1981 Ph. D., Nagoya University, (Physics) 1975 M. Eng., Nagoya University, (Applied Physics) 1973 B. Eng., Nagoya University, (Applied Physics) Synergistic Activities Synergistic research of relativistic jets integrating macroscopic and microscopic
                     processes to understand systematically involved physics Proposal reviewer for NSF, and NASA panel review, ANR (French Science Foundation),
                     Greek Science Foundation, Czech Science Foundation, and Austrian Science Fund (FWF) Manuscript reviewer for Astrophysical Journal, Physics of Plasmas, Astronomy and Astrophysics,
                     Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society, Journal of Geophysical Research, 
                     eophysical Research Letters, Nature Communications, Computer Physics Communications,
                     and New Astronomy Development of innovative simulation methods in order to understand microscopic processes
                     in macro scale and instruction of these methods to communities including collaborating
                     national and international institutions Research Articles in refereed journals(as of November 7, 2019) Nishikawa, K., Mizuno, Y., Gomez, J. L., Dutan, I., Niemiec, J., Kobzar, O., MacDonald,
                     N., Meli, A. Pohl, M., Hirotani, K., Rapid Particle Acceleration due to Re-collimation
                     in Injected Jets with Helical Magnetic Fields, ApJL, submitted, May 30, 2019 Nishikawa, K.-I., Mizuno, Y., Gomez, J. L., Dutan, I., Meli, A., White, C., Niemiec,
                     J., Kobzar, O., Pohl, M., Pe'er, A., Sol, H., MacDonald, N., Hartmann, D. H., Relativistic
                     Jet Simulations of the Weibel Instability in the Slab Model to Cylindrical Jets with
                     Helical Magnetic Fields, Galax., 7, 29; doi:10.3390/galaxies7010029, 2019 Cai, D., Lembege, B., Hasegawa, H., & Nishikawa, K.-I., Identifying 3D vortex structures
                     at/around the magnetopause using a tetrahedral satellite configuration, JGR: Space
                     Physics, 123, 10,158?10,176. https://doi.org/10.1029/2018JA025547, 2018 Nishikawa, K.-I., Mizuno, Y., Gomez, J. L., Dutan, I., Meli, A., White, C., Niemiec,
                     J., Kobzar, O., Pohl, M., Pe'er, A., Frederiksen, J. T., Nordlund, _A., Sol, H., Hardee,
                     P. E., Hartmann, D. H., Microscopic Processes In Global Relativistic Jets Containing
                     Helical Magnetic Fields, Galax., 5, 58, 2017 Mizuno, Y., Gomez, J., Nishikawa, K.-I., Meli, A., Hardee, P., Rezzolla, L., Singh,
                     C., Pino, E., Magnetic Dissipation in Relativistic Jets, Galax., 4, 40, 2016 Nishikawa, K.-I., Mizuno, Y., Niemiec, J., Kobzar, O., Pohl, M., Gomez, J., Dutan,
                     I., Pe'er, A., Frederiksen, J., Nordlund, _A., Meli, A., Sol, H., Hardee, P. E., Hartmann,
                     D. H., Microscopic Processes in Global Relativistic Jets Containing Helical Magnetic
                     Fields, Galax., 4, 38, 2016 Ardaneh, Kazem, Cai, Dongsheng, and Nishikawa, Ken-Ichi, Collisionless electron-ion
                     shocks in relativistic unmagnetized jet-ambient interactions: Non-thermal electron
                     injection by double layer, ApJ, 827, 124, 2016 (arXiv:1604.04388) (part of Ardanehs
                     Ph.D.Thesis) Niemiec, J., Florinski, V., Heerikhuisen, J., and Nishikawa, K.-I. The IBEX ribbon
                     and the pickup ion ring stability in the outer heliosheath II. Monte-Carlo and PIC
                     model results, ApJ, 826, 198, 2016 Nishikawa, K.-I., Frederiksen, J. T., Nordlund, A., Mizuno, Y., Hardee, P. E., Niemiec,
                     J., Gomez, J. L., Pe'er, A., Dutan, I., Meli, A., Sol, H., Pohl, M. & Hartmann, D.
                     H., Evolution of Global Relativistic Jets: Collimations and Expansion with kKHI and
                     the Weibel Instability, ApJ, 820, 94, 2016 (arXiv:1511.03581) Wieland, V., Pohl, M., Niemiec, J., Rafghi, I., Nishikawa, K.-I., Non-relativistic
                     Perpendicular Shocks in Supernova Remnants, ApJ, 820, 62, 2016 (arXiv:1602.05064) Nishikawa, K.-I., Frederiksen, J. T., Nordlund, A., Mizuno, Y., Hardee, P. E., Niemiec,
                     J., Gomez, J. L., Pe'er, A., Dutan, I., Meli, A., Sol, H., Pohl, M. & Hartmann, D.
                     H., Evolution of Global Relativistic Jets: Collimations and Expansion with kKHI and
                     the Weibel Instability, ApJ, 820, 94, 2016 Cai, D. Esmaeili, B. Lembege, K-I, Nishikawa, Cusp dynamics under northward IMF using
                     three-dimensional global particle-in-cell simulations, J. Geophys. Res. Space Physics,
                     120, doi:10.1002/2015JA021230, 2015
